description: This Java class, ScoreResponse, functions as a Data Transfer Object (DTO) for transferring Score entity data via API responses. It includes fields for score details, conversion methods from entity objects, and getter/setter methods.

classes.name: ScoreResponse
classes.description: A DTO class encapsulating score information for API responses, including fields, constructors, and methods for data transformation.

methods.name: fromEntity
methods.description: Converts a Score entity object to a ScoreResponse DTO.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the score.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the unique identifier of the score.

methods.name: getPlayerName
methods.description: Returns the name of the player.
